item.title: BNB Chain Foundation Acquires FAIR3 and BGSCThe BNB Chain Foundation wallet recently completed a new round of asset purchases, using a total of 50,000 USDT to purchase FAIR3 and BGSC tokens. The specific transactions are as follows: 25,000 USDT was used to exchange for 868,592.35 FAIR3, with a transaction price of approximately 0.02878 USDT, and 25,000 USDT was used to exchange for 3,723,999.37 BGSC, with a transaction price of approximately 0.00671 USDT. This operation is part of the BNB Chain's $100 million incentive plan, which aims to support high-quality projects and promote the continuous development of the ecosystem. [Foresight News]

item.title: Huobi HTX has launched XTZ and TA perpetual contracts and launched the contract trading party.On July 21, according to the official announcement, Huobi HTX launched XTZ/USDT and TA/USDT perpetual contracts on July 21, with a maximum leverage of 20 times. At the same time, Huobi HTX launched the XTZ and TA contract trading party from 20:30 on July 21 to 20:30 on July 28 (UTC+8), with a total prize pool of up to $20,000.00. During the event, users who complete the registration and participate in XTZ/USDT and TA/USDT contract transactions with a cumulative effective transaction amount of ≥10,000.00 USDT can share the prize pool based on the transaction amount ranking; new contract users who complete XTZ/USDT and TA/USDT contract transactions will also receive exclusive benefits. [PANews]

item.title: Can PI Recover From Its Demand Drought as Volume Continues to Fall?Pi Network’s token has continued to underperform, trading sideways despite the crypto market’s bullish setup. While the market rallied last week, with several assets reaching all-time highs and others climbing to multi-month peaks, PI remained in a range. With plunging interest in the altcoin, it shows little momentum to break out of its narrow range. Investor Interest Fades as PI Trades Sideways and On-Chain Activity Drops Currently trapped in a sideways trend, PI faces stiff resistance at $0.46 and a firm support level at $0.43. Unlike other assets riding the wave of renewed investor enthusiasm, PI continues to witness declining trading interest, as evidenced by a sharp drop in its on-chain trading volume. According to Santiment, this has dropped by 21% in the past seven days, signaling waning demand and growing caution among investors. A drop in trading volume means fewer investors are buying or selling the asset. It signals declining interest, lower liquidity, or general indecision in the market. As with PI, when this happens during sideways price movement, it suggests a lack of strong conviction. Neither buyers nor sellers are dominating, creating a lull in momentum. In addition, according to data from PiScan, the Pi Network is scheduled to unlock 95 million PI tokens over the next eight days, contributing to the bearish pressure on the token. With traders already wary amid persistent price stagnation and declining volume, the token unlock could strengthen PI’s price stagnation or even trigger a breakdown below support at $0.43. This is because a large influx of tokens like this increases selling pressure, particularly in bearish conditions where demand is too weak to absorb the added supply. PI’s Bearish Streak Deepens — All Eyes on $0.43 Support Level An assessment of PI’s Elder-Ray Index on the daily chart confirms the bearish tilt in market sentiment. The indicator, which gauges the strength of bulls and bears in the market, has posted a negative value since July 12, highlighting a strong bearish presence. If the current trend persists, a breakdown below the $0.43 support level appears increasingly likely, opening the door for a retest of PI’s all-time low at $0.40. However, a renewed wave of buying interest could shift momentum. Should demand rebound, PI token price may overcome resistance at $0.46 and potentially rally toward the $0.50 mark. For token TA and market updates : Want more token insights like this? Sign up for Editor Harsh Notariya’s Daily Crypto Newsletter here .

item.title: Yapper Leaderboard to Introduce Reputation Threshold MechanismKaito AI founder Yu Hu announced that the Yapper Leaderboard will launch a reputation threshold mechanism to reduce leaderboard manipulation and improve content quality. The mechanism draws on creator thresholds from platforms such as X, TikTok, and YouTube, and will be launched in the coming weeks. At the same time, Kaito will also introduce the community incentive mechanism gKAITO, allowing users with different levels of contribution to participate in platform revenue distribution. [Foresight News]

item.title: Orders to buy BSC chain Alpha tokens with limit orders on Binance Alpha CEX can enjoy 4x trading volume counted towards Alpha pointsBinance has announced that starting from 08:00 on July 22, 2025, orders to purchase BSC chain Alpha tokens with limit orders on Binance Alpha CEX will enjoy 4x trading volume counted towards Binance Alpha points. The end date of the promotion will be announced separately. Previously, Binance announced that purchasing BSC Alpha tokens or using the Alpha 2.0 limit order function to purchase other Alpha tokens would earn 2x trading volume Alpha points. [Wu Blockchain]

The strategy is supported by $3.00B in liquid funds, with an additional $300.00M used for Bitcoin-related options operations, which may be converted into spot Bitcoin in the future. [Foresight News]

item.title: US stocks Profusa signs $100.00M equity credit agreement, launches Bitcoin treasury strategyCommercial-stage digital health company Profusa (Nasdaq: PFSA) announced today that it has entered into a securities purchase agreement (equity credit agreement) with Ascent Partners Fund LLC ("Ascent") to raise up to $100 million through the issuance of common stock, and will use the net proceeds in full to purchase Bitcoin (which can be used for debt repayment), provided that the company's cash balance at the time of the equity sale is higher than $5.00 million. Under the terms of the agreement, Profusa has the right to sell common stock to Ascent at a price per share equal to 97% of the lowest volume-weighted average price (VWAP) within 5 trading days after each sale. The upper limit for a single sale is $5.00 million or 100% of the average daily trading volume for the 5 trading days prior to the sale date (whichever is lower). If the company's cash balance is less than $5.00 million, the net proceeds will be used to first replenish that amount, and the remaining funds will be used to allocate Bitcoin as a core reserve asset. (Business Insider) [Odaily]
